title: Turkish doctors use extreme cold to improve lung disease diagnosis
description: Akdeniz University's Faculty of Medicine has introduced a cutting-edge cryobiopsy technique that replaces surgical lung biopsy in diagnosing diffuse parenchymal lung diseases, commonly known as “lung stiffening.”
content:
ANTALYA
Akdeniz University's Faculty of Medicine has introduced a cutting-edge cryobiopsy technique that replaces surgical lung biopsy in diagnosing diffuse parenchymal lung diseases, commonly known… [+1651 chars]
de: Türkische Ärzte nutzen extreme Kälte, um die Diagnose von Lungenerkrankungen zu verbessern. Die medizinische Fakultät der Universität Akdeniz hat eine hochmoderne Kryobiopsietechnik eingeführt, die die chirurgische Lungenbiopsie bei der Diagnose diffuser parenchymaler Lungenerkrankungen, allgemein bekannt als „Lungenversteifung“, ersetzt.
en: Turkish doctors use extreme cold to improve lung disease diagnosis. Akdeniz University's Faculty of Medicine has introduced a cutting-edge cryobiopsy technique that replaces surgical lung biopsy in diagnosing diffuse parenchymal lung diseases, commonly known as “lung stiffening.”
la: Turcorum medici summo frigore utuntur ad diagnosin pulmonis emendandam. Akdeniz Facultas Medicinae Universitatis increptionem cryobiopsy artem induxit, quae biopsy pulmonem chirurgicum substituit in morbis pulmonis diagnosing diffusis parenchymatis, vulgo "pulmonis perustis."
